author: aandvalenzuela
body:
This PR extends the current daily summary of nodes that are still offline and adds the nodes that are still blacklisted. Lines 17-28 correspond to the script that was already sending the offline summary, but I have merged both checks into same script (previously it was directly running on the Build section in the Jenkins job).
Job: https://cmssdt.cern.ch/jenkins/view/All/job/nodes-status-summary/
title: Add blacklisted nodes to daily summary of nodes status
